title: Educational Resources
description: Materials designed for students, faculty, and university staff

resources.title: Methodological Materials
resources.description: Guidelines and methodologies on sustainable development and environmental management

resources.title: Environmental Recommendations
resources.description: Practical advice on implementing environmental practices at the university

resources.title: Digital Tools
resources.description: Guides on using digital technologies in education

resources.title: Video Materials
resources.description: Recordings of lectures, presentations, and videos from office events

infoBox.title: Access to Materials
infoBox.description: The section presents methodological materials on sustainable development, recommendations on environmental management, digital tools and guides, as well as presentations and video materials from events. All materials are available to students, faculty, and university staff.
